name: DEKA
text: Deka is my current employer and I really enjoy working with them 😁

name: Code for UV
text: I've volunteered with Code for UV off and on working on their RuralNet project.

name: Sliggooey
text: A custom client for Pokemon Showdown

name: National Api Day
text: A fun api for obscure holidays every day of the year, with data scraped from all over the internet.

name: ChupEverything
text: My best twitter bot, conjuring up bad competitors to mayochup. It's back! Tweeting every 7 hours on the half hour.

name: Thanos Tabs
text: Thanos Tabs randomly deletes half of your open tabs. Great for clearing clutter!

name: Blazing Bookmarks
text: Currently called 'Hot Bookmarks Bar' but someday I'll update the title when I work on the extension again. OMG it has 2 users!

name: Numeronym the Web
text: Converts all text on a web page to numeronyms
